database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Miguel Teixeira
entry.description: Membrane proteome-wide response to the antifungal drug clotrimazole in Candida glabrata: role of the transcription factor CgPdr1 and the Drug:H+ Antiporters CgTpo1_1 and CgTpo1_2

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that effectively converts an L-cysteine residue to S-carboxamidomethyl-L-cysteine.
